alert.note: Alert for Cocke; Greene; Sevier (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 3:21AM CDT until March 25 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cocke County in east Tennessee... Greene County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Sevier County in east Tennessee... * Until 500 AM EDT. * At 420 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Morristown to 7 miles northeast of Gatlinburg to Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greeneville, Newport, Tusculum, Parrottsville, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Mosheim, Caney Branch, Del Rio and Chucky. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 437 and 450. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 18 and 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
